description: With no one around, step-brothers Trevor Laster & Jackson Traynor only have a few hours to kill until their parents get home. They consider having some friends over, but Trevor convinces Jackson that the two of them can have their own kind of family fun. Jackson is confused until Trevor shows him exactly what kind of fun he has in mind, and though Jackson is hesitant, he's all for family. Besides, bonding with his brother in such a carnal way is the best action Jackson has had in a while. His only worry is whether or not they'll get caught before they cum!
title: Brothers In Arms
